name: Moonlighting To You [Prologue]
description:
After witnessing the murder of her boss Marie's world is thrown into a mix of courtrooms, confusion, and vampires. 

Romance an irritable lawyer, a vampire hunter, a space-case lab tech, or an accused murderer. Uncover the truth behind what you witnessed. 

Story currently includes prologue up to route selection and will be updated chapter per chapter starting with.

Features
  • 4  incredibly questionable love interests
  • 8 endings
  • Unique dialogue choice
